name: Tokyo Disneyland: Mickey no Cinderella Shiro Mystery Tour
overview: Tokyo Disneyland: Mickey no Cinderella Shiro Mystery Tour is the spiritual successor to Mickey no Tokyo Disneyland Daibouken for the Super Famicom. In it, Mickey Mouse must use his balloon backpack to traverse a castle full of Disney villains and haunted objects as he collects items to defeat the Horned King.
